description: This file defines a unit test for verifying Perl language support within an Embedded Linux SDK, using the unittest framework. It imports necessary modules, sets up test preconditions based on package availability, and executes a Perl command to verify correct installation and functionality.

classes.name: PerlTest
classes.description: A unit test class that checks the availability and execution of Perl in the SDK environment.

methods.name: setUp(self)
methods.description: Prepares the test environment by ensuring the Perl package is installed; skips the test if not available.

methods.name: test_perl(self)
methods.description: Performs a simple Perl command test to verify Perl execution capability.
